text: Samsung Spotlight is a new initiative to help support young performers in the arts who have been adversely affected by the impact of the pandemic.
With venue closures, performances cancelled and stages lost, the opportunity for young performers to break into the industry has never been more challenging.
We’ve teamed up with actor Paul Mescal to launch Samsung Spotlight which encourages creators from across the UK & Ireland to film performances and submit to Instagram via #SamsungSpotlight.
Performances can be everything from dance to physical theatre and mime, with the best three entries winning the following prize package:

items: Feature in Samsung’s new online advert
Take part in a virtual meet and greet with Paul
1 x Samsung Galaxy S20 and 1 x Samsung QLED 8K TV

text: A selection of the best entries will also be shared on our social channels and as part of a new Samsung Spotlight playlist on YouTube.
To launch the initiative, Paul has created ‘Lockdown’ a film which explores the emotions of lockdown as he dances amongst mannequins that represent the absent audience of 2020.
From dance to physical theatre, mime, self-expression, poetry and acting, you can choose any type of artistic performance that will best showcase your talents.
Think about where to shoot your content, use vibrant, colourful or interesting locations to form your backdrop and add a stylistic flair to your performance – the world is your stage!

Compose your own soundtrack or use royalty free music to set your performance to and enhance your entry. Please do not use a commercial or copyrighted track, there are plenty of royalty free music libraries for you to choose from online with examples of most music genres.
Get a family member or someone in your household to film your performance – or shoot it yourself with the help of a tripod. Be as creative as possible and most importantly, have fun!
Share your entry video to Instagram with #SamsungSpotlight for your chance to win.
